Dialog: About Dialog

Copyright 2018-2019 The MathWorks Inc.

Create the dialog

logoFcn = @()imread('mathworks_consulting_banner.png','BackgroundColor', [1 1 1]);
logoBanner = uiw.utility.loadIcon(logoFcn);
d = uiw.dialog.About(...
'Name', 'My App',...
'Version','0.0.1',...
'Date', 'May 5, 2018',...
'Timeout', 10,...
'CustomText', 'This is my favorite app.',...
'ContactInfo', 'For support call 555-1234 or support@myapp.com',...
'LogoCData', logoBanner);

Construct a dialog that disappears after a timeout

d2 = uiw.dialog.About(...
'Name', 'My App',...
'Version','0.0.1',...
'Date', 'May 5, 2018',...
'Timeout', 3); %Disappear after 3 seconds
